p: The mosquitoes were collected in a farm located at 13.6 km distance from the center of Linhares municipality, in the North of Espírito Santo state, Brazil (19°24'38.46'' S, 40°10'13.22'' W). The farm has an area of 463.6 hectares, with 61 hectares of Atlantic Rainforest and approximately 214.6 hectares of cocoa plantation. Two lakes are adjacent to the farm: Lagoa Nova and Lagoa das Palminhas. There were 20 brick houses constructed in the farm headquarters, where 38 people live ( Fig 1).
